patthana23.47:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.47:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.47:3.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
